title: Opioids In America
description: A record number of Americans have died from opioid overdoses in recent years. But how did we get here? And is this the first time Americans have faced this crisis? The short answer: no.

itunes:author: NPR
itunes:summary: Three stories of opioids that have plagued Americans for more than 150 years.
itunes:subtitle: Three stories of opioids that have plagued Americans for more than 150 years.
